showScoreExcerpt:
Almost Famous is yet another conscientious, inspiration-free film adaptation, dedicated to recreating the original's key moments without ever acquiring an identity of its own. Its account of a notably seamy milieu is so anodyne that you could schedule it on the Disney Channel, and nobody would push back. Among its sanitized features is the tamest orgy you've ever seen.

Read more
